title: Potential RCE via Unchecked User Input
description: The code does not validate or sanitize user input before using it to set properties on the m_TegraRcm object. This could lead to Remote Code Execution (RCE) if an attacker can control the input.
fix: Validate and sanitize all user inputs before processing them. Use parameterized queries or prepared statements where applicable.

reasoning.pattern: User-controlled input directly influencing object properties without validation.
reasoning.exploit_example: An attacker could inject malicious code into the user input fields, which would then be executed by the application.
